sn_cmp_cloud_template_version.body: AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09 Description: >- AWS CloudFormation Template used to stage the VPC, Subnets, Security Groups and VMs for the ACE ITOM E2E Demo. **WARNING** This template creates 3 Amazon EC2 instances. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template. Resources: InternetGateway: Type: 'AWS::EC2::InternetGateway' Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 3d1b082e-d87e-4eb3-9dc5-68c90896c9e3 VPCGatewayAttachment: Type: 'AWS::EC2::VPCGatewayAttachment' Properties: InternetGatewayId: !Ref InternetGateway VpcId: !Ref VPC Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: da825ebd-5abe-4d1b-a160-e7057336d8bb SubnetA: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Subnet' Properties: AvailabilityZone: us-west-2a VpcId: !Ref VPC CidrBlock: 172.25.1.0/24 MapPublicIpOnLaunch: true Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - MSPHosting - '-' - !Ref LABCODE Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: d0953705-9702-4594-bbd9-6c81a69da836 SubnetB: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Subnet' Properties: AvailabilityZone: us-west-2b VpcId: !Ref VPC CidrBlock: 172.25.2.0/24 MapPublicIpOnLaunch: true Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - SiteDepot - '-' - !Ref LABCODE Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 9c2eab43-fc63-45f4-b95d-100f09218026 SubnetC: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Subnet' Properties: AvailabilityZone: us-west-2c VpcId: !Ref VPC CidrBlock: 172.25.3.0/24 MapPublicIpOnLaunch: true Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - WebStore - '-' - !Ref LABCODE Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 1ca0a882-0482-45ed-9437-e423f75cd07d RouteTable: Type: 'AWS::EC2::RouteTable' Properties: VpcId: !Ref VPC Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: d475117d-437b-42d8-a9c5-516dbca6a53c InternetRoute: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Route' Properties: RouteTableId: !Ref RouteTable DestinationCidrBlock: 0.0.0.0/0 GatewayId: !Ref InternetGateway Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 9def4a67-9ef7-465b-bf5f-72c7a28d93a9 DependsOn: - VPCGatewayAttachment SubnetARouteTableAssociation: Type: 'AWS::EC2::SubnetRouteTableAssociation' Properties: SubnetId: !Ref SubnetA RouteTableId: !Ref RouteTable Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 086d2cb8-822a-47d8-9aef-61bf4ba6df8b SubnetBRouteTableAssociation: Type: 'AWS::EC2::SubnetRouteTableAssociation' Properties: RouteTableId: !Ref RouteTable SubnetId: !Ref SubnetB Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 0232983b-1576-4a34-afc8-36b9cb98160f SubnetCRouteTableAssociation: Type: 'AWS::EC2::SubnetRouteTableAssociation' Properties: RouteTableId: !Ref RouteTable SubnetId: !Ref SubnetC Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 8c31c02c-a2d9-4e51-9b2c-0306ac4b626a SecurityGroup: Type: 'AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup' Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: e07d019d-8259-439d-9944-f25d86797b8c Properties: GroupName: ACEGroup GroupDescription: ACE Security Group VpcId: !Ref VPC SecurityGroupIngress: - IpProtocol: -1 CidrIp: 172.25.0.0/16 - IpProtocol: tcp FromPort: '22' ToPort: '22' CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0 - IpProtocol: tcp FromPort: '3389' ToPort: '3389' CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0 - IpProtocol: tcp FromPort: '80' ToPort: '80' CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0 - IpProtocol: tcp FromPort: '443' ToPort: '443' CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0 SecurityGroupEgress: - IpProtocol: -1 CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0 Tags: - Key: Name Value: ACEGroup VPC: Type: 'AWS::EC2::VPC' Properties: CidrBlock: 172.25.0.0/16 EnableDnsSupport: true EnableDnsHostnames: true InstanceTenancy: default Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - ACE-ITOM-Showcase - '-' - !Ref LABCODE Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 6dd8dc67-7cd0-4124-b688-a6d4fbce4922 JUMPHOST: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Instance' Properties: SubnetId: !Ref SubnetA InstanceType: t2.small ImageId: ami-05a65e437c041575b KeyName: ACE-Linux-SSH IamInstanceProfile: AllAccess Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - ACE-MSP-JUMPHOST - '-' - !Ref LABCODE - Key: OSType Value: Windows SecurityGroupIds: - !Ref SecurityGroup Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 9e136d63-3914-41ff-ba6e-1f4e8faa05da MID: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Instance' Properties: SubnetId: !Ref SubnetA InstanceType: t2.xlarge ImageId: ami-02d40c3e83c760312 KeyName: ACE-Linux-SSH IamInstanceProfile: AllAccess Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - ACE-MSP-MID - '-' - !Ref LABCODE - Key: OSType Value: Windows SecurityGroupIds: - !Ref SecurityGroup Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: b13b4274-3b87-4eb7-aed0-dbce51724abf AnsibleTower: Type: 'AWS::EC2::Instance' Properties: SubnetId: !Ref SubnetA InstanceType: t2.xlarge ImageId: ami-07696ed534349e0fa KeyName: ACE-Linux-SSH IamInstanceProfile: AllAccess Tags: - Key: Name Value: !Join - '' - - ACE-MSP-TOWER - '-' - !Ref LABCODE - Key: OSType Value: Linux SecurityGroupIds: - !Ref SecurityGroup Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 8b382698-7795-4598-85e6-06f5534fb7a1 ElasticIP: Type: 'AWS::EC2::EIP' Properties: Domain: vpc Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 3344fde8-388b-4368-b614-f90a7275d0dd EC2EIPA21E7L: Type: 'AWS::EC2::EIPAssociation' Properties: InstanceId: !Ref AnsibleTower AllocationId: !GetAtt - ElasticIP - AllocationId Metadata: 'AWS::CloudFormation::Designer': id: 4691e2de-2185-4e9a-9c13-6c863622a6cb Parameters: LABCODE: Description: Users LAB Code Type: String
